functions.name: getFlagValues
functions.description: Get the values of a flag for one or more message IDs

parameters.name: flagKey
parameters.description: Flag whose value(s) you want to get (replied, forwarded)

parameters.name: messageIds
parameters.description: message ID(s) you want the flag value(s) for

functions.name: setFlagValues
functions.description: Set the value of a flag for one or more messages

parameters.name: flagKey
parameters.description: Flag whose value(s) you want to set (replied, forwarded)

parameters.name: flagValue
parameters.description: Value of the flag you want to set

parameters.name: messageIds
parameters.description: message ID(s) you want to set the flag value(s) for
